New Records: Quinton de Kock surpassed India's Virat Kohli for the most runs and also surpassed Australia's David Warner (163) for the highest individual score in this World Cup.
Key Match Events: South Africa defeated Bangladesh by 149 runs in the ICC World Cup 2023 group stage match.
Quinton de Kock scored a record 174 runs.
Heinrich Klaasen scored an explosive 90 off just 49 balls.
Marco Jansen took two crucial wickets in the seventh over.
Gerald Coetzee took 3 wickets for 62 runs.
Mahmudullah scored a century for Bangladesh.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa posted their 3rd 350-plus total in the ongoing World Cup 2023.
Bangladesh suffered their third-largest defeat in World Cup history.
South Africa leapfrogged New Zealand to jump to the second spot in the points table.
